metadata.title: CVE-2022-3261 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenStack. Multiple components show plain-textpasswords in /var/log/messages during the OpenStack overcloud update run,leading to a disclosure of sensitive information problem.

criterions.comment: openstack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
